org.drip.analytics.creator

Class DiscountCurveBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.creator.DiscountCurveBuilder

  • public class DiscountCurveBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the baseline discount curve builder object. It contains static functions that build bootstrapped and other types of discount curve from differing types of inputs.
